Description.Name: Tex
Description.Details: Hailing from the Lyran Commonwealth is 'Tex', a MechWarrior with a tendency for hotheadedness that doesn't talk much about his past. In typical mercenary fashion he is rough around the edges, but reliable when he gets paid. A professor of Inner Sphere history with a strong dislike of Clanner society. A veteran of many campaigns, he has demonstrated how to survive to payday. He gives guest lectures wherever he goes, and has caused political incidents for Mercenary Groups he's been working for with them. SPECIAL AFFINITY WITH AWESOMES CHECK PASSIVE ABILITES IN COMBAT FOR A UNIQUE SURPRISE
